T02D1637:265b-2: * // rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1637:265b-3: las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1637:265b-4: byang chub tu sems brtan par gyur pas /
T02D1637:265b-5: byang chub sgrub pa'i lam ma nor ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i thabs /
T02D1637:265b-6: lus ngag yid gsum mi dge ba las bzlog nas /
T02D1637:265b-7: dge ba'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i rim pa ni dang por gnas yid du 'ong bar /
T02D1637:265b-8: srog chags bsal ba'i sa la 'jim pa byas la /
T02D1637:265b-9: mandala gzhung bzhin du byas te /
T02D1637:265b-10: aom badzra re khe hr'i:zhes brjod cing /
T02D1637:265b-11: ba'i rdzas lngas 'og ma yang bya'o //
T02D1637:265b-12: de ltar mandala byed pa'i dus su phan yon yang brjod par bya ste /
T02D1637:265b-13: chur bcas lci ba sbyin yin te //
T02D1637:265b-14: skyong nul bya ba tshul khrims yin //
T02D1637:265b-15: grog mo sogs bsal bzod pa yin //
T02D1637:265b-16: bya ba brtson pa brtson 'grus yin //
T02D1637:265b-17: de rtse gcig pa bsam gtan te //
T02D1637:265b-18: ri mo snyoms pa shes rab yin //
T02D1637:265b-19: thub pa'i mandala byas pas pha rol phyin drug 'di dag rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1637:265b-20: lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing //
T02D1637:265b-21: nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02D1637:265b-22: rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pas gang bar skye //
T02D1637:265b-23: de nas lha mi mchog gi khyim du lus las bya //
T02D1637:265b-26: mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham /
T02D1637:265b-27: lus kyi sgo dag par byas la /
T02D1637:265b-29: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha gang yin ngu bsgoms la /
T02D1637:265b-30: h'um gis lce dang lag pa byin gyis brlabs la //
T02D1637:265b-31: padma'i bskor ba dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu blangs te//
T02D1637:266a-0: @266a * // brla steng gnyis su bzhag nas /
T02D1637:266a-1: h'um dang a'a:sa rdo rje dril bu byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1637:266a-2: de kho na nyid 'di brjod de /
T02D1637:266a-3: h'um thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1637:266a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1637:266a-5: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1637:266a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po gtso ;
T02D1637:266a-7: / zhes brjod la rdo rje gsor zhing //
T02D1637:266a-8: aom ma h'a badzra h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1637:266a-9: dril bu'i de kho na nyid 'di brjod do /
T02D1637:266a-10: a'a:srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir /
T02D1637:266a-11: ngo bo nyid kyis gdod nas dag / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D1637:266a-12: srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed //
T02D1637:266a-13: ces brjod la dril bu gsil zhing /
T02D1637:266a-14: aom badzra ghande a'a:zhes brjod do //
T02D1637:266a-15: de nas aom badzra raksha raksha ku ru h'um phat /
T02D1637:266a-16: ces brjod pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1637:266a-17: de nas mchod pa rnams kyi steng du h'um dkar po re re bsams la /
T02D1637:266a-19: zhes brjod pas h'um 'od du zhu nas /
T02D1637:266a-20: bdud rtsi ru byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1637:266a-21: de nas bdag nyid kyi lha gang yin pa'i snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas /
T02D1637:266a-22: lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D1637:266a-23: chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla ma
T02D1637:266a-24: dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D1637:266a-25: mchod pa dngos su 'byor na dbul te /
T02D1637:266a-26: aom badzra aargham pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-28: aom p'a tyam pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-30: aom aanydza m'a ni pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-32: aom padma ka ma la pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-34: aom badzra mandala pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-36: aom badzra dh'u pe pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-37: aom badzra pushpe pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-38: aom badzra a'a lo ke pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-39: aom badzra gandhe pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-40: aom badzra nee bi tya pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-41: aom badzra g'i ti pra t'itstsha a'a:h'um /
T02D1637:266a-42: zhes pas mchod pa rnams phul la /
T02D1637:266a-43: de nas yan lag bdun pa rnams bya ste /
T02D1637:266a-44: na mo sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla
T02D1637:266a-45: ma dam pa dang bcas pa bdag la dgongs su
T02D1637:266a-46: gsol / bdag gis 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe /
T02D1637:266a-47: skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag tu /
T02D1637:266a-48: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa thams cad mthol zhing bshags par bgyi'o //
T02D1637:266b-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub @266b sems dpa' dang /
T02D1637:266b-1: so so'i skye bo khyad par can gyi dge ba
T02D1637:266b-2: thams cad la yi rang zhing spro bar bgyid do
T02D1637:266b-3: // bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D1637:266b-4: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas
T02D1637:266b-5: dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang
T02D1637:266b-6: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
T02D1637:266b-8: bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste /
T02D1637:266b-9: ji srid du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D1637:266b-10: bde ba bsgrub pa'i slad du ji srid du mya
T02D1637:266b-11: ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa de
T02D1637:266b-12: srid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1637:266b-13: bdag gis theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags bla na med pa'i lam bsten par bgyi'o //
T02D1637:266b-14: bdag gi rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi dngos po
T02D1637:266b-15: 'di yang zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul nas mchod
T02D1637:266b-16: par bgyi'o // na mo bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa
T02D1637:266b-17: ba thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D1637:266b-19: de nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1637:266b-20: sangs rgyas gtso la yon tan mchog mnga' ba //
T02D1637:266b-21: che dgus mchod cing yon tan sprin tshogs 'dus //
T02D1637:266b-22: go 'phang mchog brnyes ston pa chos char 'bebs //
T02D1637:266b-23: sangs rgyas dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D1637:266b-24: skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i //
T02D1637:266b-25: shin tu phan dang bde ba nges mdzad gsung //
T02D1637:266b-26: 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan mi 'da' ba'i //
T02D1637:266b-27: dam chos dkon mchog de la rtag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1637:266b-28: dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' ba'i ;
T02D1637:266b-29: / bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1637:266b-30: bdag gzhan don phyir sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i //
T02D1637:266b-31: dge 'dun dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1637:266b-32: de nas gsang sngags dang gzungs sngags bzlas /
T02D1637:266b-37: de nas spyan drangs pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1637:266b-39: mdo rgyud rtogs pa'i dgongs pa'i 'grel mdzad cing //
T02D1637:266b-40: nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs spong thabs bstan nas //
T02D1637:267a-2: dus gsum bla ma rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1637:267a-3: skye zhing skye bdag ni thams cad du //
T02D1637:267a-4: blo ldan rigs bzang nga rgyal med pa dang //
T02D1637:267a-5: snying rje che zhing bla ma la dad cing //
T02D1637:267a-6: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig la gnas nas //
T02D1637:267a-7: mchog dang thun mong dngos grub myur thob nas //
T02D1637:267a-8: 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don byed shog /
